SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am13
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am13.client.network.rmi

Interface GameListenerClientRMIIF

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameListenerClientRMI
public interface GameListenerClientRMIIF extends Remote
Interface exposed remotely by the client representing the client-side listener for RMI connection. It is the actual interface the client should pass to the server when it connects to the room/game as a reference to itself, which the server can then use to send updates to the client. It handles the updates the server sends to the clients, by modifying the view and updating the internal game's state

    • updateStartGame

      void updateStartGame(GameState state, GameControllerRMIIF controller) throws RemoteException, InvalidPlayerException
      The game has started: starter cards and initial cards have been given to the players. The specified model contains the initial set up for the started game. This triggers also the beginning of the thread for sending pings
      Parameters:
      state - The current game state when the method is called
      Throws:
      RemoteException
      InvalidPlayerException

    • updateGameModel

      void updateGameModel(GameState state, GameControllerRMIIF controller, PlayerLobby player) throws RemoteException
      This method should be called once the player has reconnected an already started game. It updates the entire game's state, i.e. it creates a new game's state starting from the specified model (reconstructing the current situation in game).
      Parameters:
      state - The current game state when the method is called
      Throws:
      RemoteException

      Parameters:

      cardStarter - The starter card played.
      availableCoords - The list of coordinates that are available to play a card

      Parameters:

      cardPlayed - The card played.

      The game is in the final phase.
      Parameters:
      turnsToEnd - Number of turns to reach the end of the turn-based phase
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • updatePoints

      void updatePoints(Map<PlayerLobby,Integer> pointsMap) throws RemoteException
      The points given by Objective cards (common and personal) have been calculated. Following the game's rules, the specified points are the final ones
      Parameters:
      pointsMap - A map containing the points of each player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException

      Parameters:
      winners - The player(s) that has won the game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • updateEndGame

      void updateEndGame() throws RemoteException
      The game has ended. After this update, the server should not respond to any other request This triggers also the interruption for the thread sending pings
      Throws:
      RemoteException
